welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Bedford Heights, known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and delicious food. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport houses the majority of the airport's facilities, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves domestic flights and features a variety of amenities such as a children's play area, charging stations, and a selection of restaurants and shops.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves international flights and features a variety of amenities such as a business center, currency exchange, and duty-free shopping options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
